MolModMT

Basic manipulations¶

General and basic methods to operate with molecular models and their forms.

load(item[, selection, frame_indices, …])

Loading a molecular model.

convert(item[, to_form, selection, …])

Convert a molecular model into other form.

info(item[, target, indices, selection, …])

Print out general information of a molecular model.

select(item[, selection, target, syntaxis])

Get the atom indices corresponding to a selection criterion.

get(item[, target, indices, selection, …])

Get specific attributes and observables.

set(item[, target, indices, selection, …])

Set a new value to an attribute.

extract(item[, selection, frame_indices, …])

Extract a subset of a molecular model.

duplicate([item])

merge([item1, item2, to_form])

XXX

write([item, filename, selection, …])

view([item, viewer, selection, …])

Estructural observables and transformations¶

Methods to extract or to modify structural and geometrical observables of a molecular model.

get(item[, target, indices, selection, …])

Get specific attributes and observables.

distance([item_1, selection_1, …])

maximum_distance([item_1, selection_1, …])

minimum_distance([item_1, selection_1, …])

neighbors_lists([item_1, selection_1, …])

center([item, selection, selection_groups, …])

center_of_mass([item, selection, …])

geometrical_center([item, selection, …])

recenter(item[, selection, …])

radius_of_gyration([item, selection, frame, …])

rmsd([item, selection, frame_indices, …])

least_rmsd([item, selection, frame_indices, …])

least_rmsd_fit([item, selection, …])

wrap_molecules_to_pbc_cell(self)

unwrap_molecules_from_pbc_cell(item[, …])

minimum_image_convention(item[, selection, …])

Topological observables and transformations¶

Methods to extract or modify topological observables of a molecular model.

get(item[, target, indices, selection, …])

Get specific attributes and observables.

Physical or chemical observables and transformations¶

Methods to extract or modify topological observables of a molecular model.

get(item[, target, indices, selection, …])

Get specific attributes and observables.
